text: It seems you need to create a new wrapper here. I'll document how to do it later. (StateOverriddenEnv doesn't work here since the mapping function only applies to the original state)

text: Hey, any chance you had some time to write about this?

elements.text: Hey, any chance you had some time to write about this?

text:
I wanted to shift some of my python experiments to julia, just need to wrangle the environment definition. Basically I just need to augment cartpole with some new actions and new component for the state.
In openai-gym I used `gym.Wrapper`
